name: Amaretto Sour
ingredients: 3/5 shot glass amaretto liqueur OR 1/2 shot glass amaretto syrup
2/5 shot glass bourbon whiskey (or 1/2 shot if using syrup)
1/5 shot glass simple syrup (reduce to 1/10 shot if using amaretto syrup)
Maraschino cherry and lemon slice for garnish
instructions: Add amaretto liqueur or syrup, bourbon, lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg white (if using) to a shaker.
Dry shake (without ice) for 10 seconds if using egg white.
Add ice to the shaker and shake vigorously for 15 seconds.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry and lemon slice.
